excerpt: "SPAN: Every speaker, every video, every moment of each convention served as a reminder of the coronavirus, which has claimed more than 180,000 lives. The RNC speeches by Trump and others had a far different view of the president’s performance on the pandemic than last week’s Democratic convention."
